channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- ansible-tower
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- ansible-tower

item.title: CVE-2018-10884|2024-08-05T07:54:34.882Z -- red%20hat -- ansible-tower
item.description: Ansible Tower before versions 3.1.8 and 3.2.6 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) in awx/api/authentication.py. An attacker could exploit this by tricking already authenticated users into visiting a malicious site and hijacking the authtoken cookie.
